title: When God Doesn't Listen
itunes:title: When God Doesn't Listen
description:
It’s easy to go through life dwelling on your past mistakes. But if you want God to listen, you have to approach Him with the language of faith. God doesn’t listen when you tell Him you don’t deserve to be blessed. He’s already forgiven you. Accept His mercy today for any mistake you’ve made.To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
